block.p: The Government's index of leading indicators, its main gauge for predicting the economy, fell in November for the fifth straight month. The decline suggested there would be no end soon to the contraction that now lacks only formal designation as the nation's ninth postwar recession. Page 29. Farewell to Nancy Cruzan
A once-vivacious young woman who became a national symbol for the right to die was buried in a country cemetery in Missouri. Page 8. Advice on Direct Deposits
Direct deposits of salaries and other funds are convenient, but problems can arise. What to do if things go awry. Consumer's World, page 46.

The Government's index of leading indicators, its main gauge for predicting the economy, fell in November for the fifth straight month. The decline suggested there would be no end soon to the contraction that now lacks only formal designation as the nation's ninth postwar recession. Page 29. Farewell to Nancy Cruzan
A once-vivacious young woman who became a national symbol for the right to die was buried in a country cemetery in Missouri. Page 8. Advice on Direct Deposits
Direct deposits of salaries and other funds are convenient, but problems can arise. What to do if things go awry. Consumer's World, page 46.
